lead_paragraph: Paraguay starlet Sergio Diaz is thrilled to be moving to Real Madrid but has yet to find out if he will join the first team squad for pre-season training or play for the club's Castilla reserve side, he told Spanish media.

headline.print_headline: Diaz Eager to Showcase His Talent at Real Madrid
headline.main: Diaz Eager to Showcase His Talent at Real Madrid

snippet: Paraguay starlet Sergio Diaz is thrilled to be moving to Real Madrid but has yet to find out if he will join the first team squad for pre-season training or play for the club's Castilla reserve side, he told Spanish media....
